Boram Lee Data Scientist

About Me Projects

Hello, I’m Boram Lee. I am passionate about Artificial Intelligence, particularly in analyzing physiological data like EEG and ECG, and developing wearable healthcare solutions. My background includes research and journal publications in EEG and ECG, a master’s degree in Brain and Cognitive Engineering, and five years of experience managing data science projects in NLP. I also developed an AI-powered healthcare application for seniors, focusing on mental health and medication management. In my free time, I enjoy movies, exploring new places, and spending time with animals.

Research

My research focuses on brain engineering using machine learning, NLP applications, including chatbots and voicebots, and healthcare data analysis. Additionally, I hold three patents and have a paper published in an international journal, all based on these research areas.

Language

I am skilled in Python and SQL, which I used extensively for developing a healthcare application and analyzing NLP projects. Additionally, my academic research experience has made me proficient in MATLAB and R. I also enjoy designing and customizing my own websites using HTML and JavaScript.

Tools

To implement deep learning and AI algorithms, I primarily use PyTorch and TensorFlow. For collaboration and development, I rely on Git and Docker. When developing chatbots and voicebots, I utilized GCP and AWS for cloud computing, managing application maintenance through services like autoscaling and database management.
